p: The activity of coumarin derivatives on α-glucosidase was also reviewed in 2020 [ 35], in a study in which the influence of the substitution pattern was evaluated, and an important SAR was established. In addition to α-glucosidase, aldehyde dehydrogenase 1A1 (ALDH1A1) is another target for the treatment of diabetes and obesity, and 3-amidocoumarins have been described as inhibitors of this enzyme, with compound XXII ( Figure 6) being a very promising derivative (IC 50 = 3.87 mM) [ 36]. This activity has also recently been found for hybrids of coumarin and cinnamic acid, with compound XXIII ( Figure 6) being described as a very promising derivative (IC 50 = 12.98 mM) [ 37].
